a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of child deaths by source, World, 1990 to 2020
Comparison of estimates of the total number of deaths in children under five years old from the UN Inter-agency Group
for Child Mortality Estimation, and the IHME, Global Burden of Disease study
Data source: UN Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation (via World Bank); IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
